name: Use_Metadata_API
description: Upserts a Metadata type given its name and attribute map as JSON. Uses an MDAPI Apex wrapper and upsertmetadata

typeName.description: The official Salesforce Metadata Type Name. Find them here https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_meta.meta/api_meta/meta_types_list.htm

attributesJson.description: A JSON with all relevant attributes needed to create this metadata type.. Find them here https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_meta.meta/api_meta/meta_types_list.htm
